exposurecontrol: Programmed auto with flexible program, shutter priority auto, aperture-priority auto, manual with exposure bracketing and exposure compensation (±5 EV [photos] or ±2 EV [movies] in steps of 1/3 EV)
speed: 1/2000 - 30 s; bulb and time available in mode M (time requires optional ML-L3 remote control)
monitor: 7.5 cm (3-in.), approx. 921k-dot, TFT LCD with a wide viewing angle, anti-reflection coating, and 9-level brightness adjustment
powersources: One Rechargeable Li-ion Battery EN-EL20 (supplied) AC Adapter EH-5b; requires Power Connector EP-5C (available separately)
flashcontrol: TTL auto flash with monitor pre-flashes; manual flash control available; Guide Number approx. 6/21, or 6/22 when fired in manual mode at full power (ISO 100, m/ft, 23 °C/73.4 °F)
focallength: 18.5 mm (angle of view equivalent to that of 28 mm lens in 35mm [135] format)
focusrange: Approx. 50 cm (1 ft 8 in.) to infinity; approx. 10 cm (4 in.) to infinity in macro autofocus mode. All distances measured from center of front surface of lens.
dimensionswxhxd: Approx. 111.0 x 64.3 x 40.3 mm (4.4 x 2.6 x 1.6 in.), excluding projections
fileformats: Still pictures: JPEG, RAW (NEF; a proprietary Nikon format) Movies: MOV (Video: H.264/MPEG-4 AVC, Audio: Linear stereo PCM)
imagesensor: 3.6 x 15.6 mm Nikon DX format CMOS; approx. 16.93 million total pixels
isosensitivitystandardoutputsensitivity: ISO 100 - 3200; can be adjusted using ISO sensitivity to 6400, Hi 0.3 (ISO 8000 equivalent), Hi 0.7 (ISO 10000 equivalent), Hi 1 (ISO 12800 equivalent), and Hi 2 (ISO 25600 equivalent)
